name: Death's Head Helmet
description:
Item Type: Medium Armor
Damage Reduction: 30%
Temp. Rating: -52 / 82 °C
Built using high quality scavenge with a molded faceplate, the Death's Head is built to take an absolute beating.

使用了高质量的回收材料和模铸的面具板，死亡头骨头盔转为能挨最毒的打而生。
